channel.description:

item.title: Looking for Podcast Similar to Discern Realities
item.dc:creator: @Alexi_Sarge
item.description:
@Alexi_Sarge wrote:

Several of the other Gauntlet podcasts follow that format: discussion or analysis followed by actual play. Check out Plus One Forward for episodes focused on various PbtA games, and the Trophy podcast The Sixth Ring for episodes about various topics related to the Trophy RPG. Both conclude with actual play segments.

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for Podcast Similar to Discern Realities
